project.name: C-C785A-GIMP-09-ST03-DT07-DF06-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C785A-GIMP-09-ST03-DT07-DF06-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Has a buffer declared on the stack. char[20] If input is resolved to a value larger than 20 it will overflow

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
